sections.heading: history record information; dissemination; limitations; removal; certain information not part of public record; court; duties; sealed record; effect; expungement
sections.text: (1) After the expiration of the periods described in subsection (3) of this section or after the granting of a motion under subsection (4)

sections.heading: authorizes an aggrieved individual to bring an action, not to file a motion in the criminal case the record of which he or she seeks to seal pursuant to this section
sections.text: An "action" is a distinct and separate court proceeding, governed by separate pleadings and requiring separate process. State v. Cobl
